import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import './tour-card.css'; const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title, city, photo, price, featured, avgRating, reviews} = tour const totalRatting = reviews ?.reduce((acc,item)) return
{ featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price} /per person
} export default TourCard
